SELECT distinct r.id as mode_id,if(count(ar.id)>1,null,ar.id) as app_role_id,r.mode_name,if(min(ar.status) is null,1,ar.status) as mode_status FROM send_mode as r left join app_role as ar on r.id=ar.mode_id and r.is_deleted=0 and ar.is_deleted=0 and ar.app_id=#{appId} group by r.id

select ar.id as app_role_id,ar.sms_template_id as id,t.content,ar.status from app_role as ar left join sms_template as t on ar.sms_template_id=t.id and t.is_deleted=0 where ar.mode_id=#{modeId} and ar.app_id=#{appId} and ar.is_deleted=0

SELECT p.id,ar.id as app_role_id,p.provider_name as wechat_name,ar.status FROM app_role as ar left join provider as p on ar.wechat_id=p.id and p.is_deleted=0 and ar.mode_id=4 where ar.app_id=#{appId} and p.type=4 and ar.is_deleted=0;
